query: the frequency of solar storms with impact on electric circuits on earth

original_query.title: the frequency of solar storms with impact on electric circuits on earth
original_query.description: How often do solar storms occur which have a noticeable impact on electric circuits on earth?
original_query.narrative: Scientific publications or articles which describe how often solar storms occur (or how likely it is that such a storm occurs), which have an impact on our modern civilization in the form of damaging or destroying electrical circuits such as power supply or communication infrastructure. Especially sources which say how often these occurred in the past should be retrieved as relevant.

original_query.title: popular pastries in germany
original_query.description: Which are the best-selling pastries in Germany?
original_query.narrative: Find statistics, news articles or other information about the most popular sweet bakery products in Germany. The sources should contain specific information about the best-selling bakery products in Germany. It could contain information about specific products or categories of products.

original_query.title: flights Frankfurt to Rome
original_query.description: Show flight connections from Frankfurt to Rome.
original_query.narrative: Relevant are all future flight connections from Frankfurt to Rome. We are not (yet) interested in connections in the opposite direction, nor flights from or to other cities or how to make the journey by other means of transport.

original_query.title: remove wine stains
original_query.description: How can wine stains be removed?
original_query.narrative: Relevant is all information about wine stain removal. The removal of other substances is not of interest. Nor do we want to acquire wine bottles from a shop.

original_query.title: tipping in us
original_query.description: What tipping is considered appropriate for whom in the US?
original_query.narrative: We ask for some guidelines of how to correctly tip in the US. The results should be of recent nature in order to account for inflation. ,us' should be recognized as an acronym for the United States. How to tip in other countries is not of interest.

original_query.title: download python
original_query.description: Direct me to pages from which python can be downloaded.
original_query.narrative: Relevant are trustworthy pages from which python can be downloaded. Results that misinterpret python as an animal as well as resources that provide information about how to download other programs are not of interest.

original_query.title: buy bicycle lock Jena
original_query.description: Where can a bicycle lock be bought in Jena?
original_query.narrative: Relevant results indicate shops in Jena that offer bicycle locks. Shops outside of Jena or shops that offer either bicycles or general locks but not locks for bicycles are not of interest.

query: Current head of state of germany

original_query.title: Current head of state of germany
original_query.description: Who is the current head of state of Germany?
original_query.narrative: Relevant results include information about the head of state of Germany and the time frame of them being head of state. Sources which only include heads of state of Germany without information about when they were head of state or sources which include only heads of state of other countries are not relevant.

original_query.title: fastest route jena leipzig
original_query.description: Which is the fastest means of transport from Jena to Leipzig right now and which route should I take?
original_query.narrative: Look for the fastest connection in public transport between Jena and Leipzig at the time and calculate the time it would take when using a car from and to each city centre. Display the route which takes the least time. Do not display routes from Leipzig to Jena and do not show train connections that already departed.

original_query.title: lost my keys what now
original_query.description: What can be done if you lose your apartment keys?
original_query.narrative: Relevant is all information on how to get your keys back or on how to get back into your apartment. It could contain certain addresses for places where lost things are returned to, detailed instructions on how to get into the apartment yourself without keys or provide contact details for locksmiths.

original_query.title: an apple everyday healthy?
original_query.description: What effects does eating an apple everyday have on the health of human body?
original_query.narrative: Show scientific publications and health expert opinions on the effects of eating apples everyday. They should include information about the potential health benefits and risks of doing so. It could also cover the nutritional values of apples.

original_query.title: what temperature for green tea
original_query.description: What is the optimal temperature for the water for green tea preparation?
original_query.narrative: Find resources which explain which temperature the water should have to prepare green tea. Ressources which only give general information about the green tea preparation without stating an optimal temperature are not relevant.

original_query.narrative: Find publications about the weather in jena in the winter. Of interest are statistic based articles or publications which give a concrete probability of there being snow at least once in December in Jena, based on the weather in the previous years.

original_query.narrative: Relevant are manuals, guides and forum entries on the matter that indicate how to take a screenshot. Not relevant are information about glass windows or information concerning other operating systems.

original_query.narrative: Either show the user its IP address directly as a search result or display relevant documents and manuals on how to determine ones IPv4 address. Should not display other IP addresses that do not belong to the user or the address of his current location.

original_query.narrative: Relevant topics include any news website focused on movies or cinema and top-ten lists of movies in 2023. Topics that focus on films released in previous years or in future or reviews of movies are less relevant.

original_query.title: Knowledge Graphs in Information Retrieval
original_query.description: The user is looking for information about the use of knowledge graphs in information retrieval, including their applications, advantages, and how they enhance search and recommendation systems.
original_query.narrative: Relevant topics include research papers on knowledge graph-based information retrieval, articles from tech companies employing knowledge graphs, and case studies on their implementation. Topics discussing graph databases, semantic web technologies, and real-world examples of how knowledge graphs improve search and recommendation systems are considered relevant. However, topics unrelated to knowledge graphs in information retrieval or those discussing other graph-related concepts are not relevant.

original_query.title: DuckDuckGo Search Engine
original_query.description: The user is interested in learning about the DuckDuckGo search engine, including its features, privacy policies, and how it differs from other search engines like Google.
original_query.narrative: Relevant topics include articles about DuckDuckGo's privacy-centric approach to search, its search features, and user reviews. Sources discussing DuckDuckGo's business model, comparisons with other search engines, and its commitment to user data privacy are considered relevant. However, topics unrelated to DuckDuckGo or those promoting other search engines are not relevant.

original_query.title: Biodiversity Conservation and Importance
original_query.description: The user is interested in understanding the importance of biodiversity conservation and its impact on ecosystems and human well-being.

original_query.narrative: Relevant: Scientific data, research findings, articles, and reports on the causes and consequences of climate change. Not Relevant: Climate change denial, unrelated environmental topics, or news unrelated to the science of climate change.

original_query.title: Home Assistant unavailable
original_query.description: The user wants to determine why his Home Assistant instance is unavailable and what can be done to make it available again?
original_query.narrative: Search results include debugging advice for figuring out why a Home Assistant instance is unavailable and which actions can be taken to resolve this issue. original_query.narrative: Relevant sources include documentation related to ESPHome, more specifically networking and connection-related components. Additional general advice on how to configure ESPHome devices can be beneficial.

original_query.description: Which tools are available for the Architecture Analysis and Design Language?
original_query.narrative: Relevant sources include information about the Architecture Analysis and Design language(AADL) and tools that can  be used to work with AADL. Not relevant are resources which also use the acronym AADL but don't refer to the Architecture analysis and Design language.

original_query.title: 3D print warping
original_query.description: What is warping in the context of 3D printing and how can it be avoided?
original_query.narrative: Explanation of 3d printing and reasons for warping parts. Explanations of possible solutions for avoiding warping or Elephants foot. Details on contracting plastic during the extrusion process.

original_query.description: The user is interested in a Guide on how to set up an OpenGL development environment.
original_query.narrative: General information about OpenGL and System requirements. Results should also include resources on how OpenGL development environments can be set up. They should not be Operating-System-dependent.

original_query.title: raspberry pi power consumption
original_query.description: How many watts does a current Raspberry Pi consume on average?
original_query.narrative: Relevant documents must contain information about the energy consumption of a current Raspberry Pi. It does not matter which generation or which specific model is involved. However, documents that are about the Raspberry Pi microcontrollers or accessory items are not relevant. Also not relevant are documents that are only about power (consumption) or only about the Raspberry Pi in general.

original_query.title: light motion detector types

original_query.narrative: Relevant documents deal with various motion detection sensors that are built into lamps, as well as related technologies and features. original_query.title: meditation for stress
original_query.description: How can mindfulness meditation alleviates stress and anxiety?
original_query.narrative: Relevant documents should provide insights into how mindfulness meditation is integrated into everyday life to effectively reduce stress, including practical information on small daily exercises and techniques. Irrelevant documents include unrelated forms of therapy or  general meditation techniques lacking the application of mindfulness meditation specific for stress. Furthermore, sources merely selling courses or presenting some meditation gurus are considered irrelevant as well. Finally, materials that solely contain anecdotal experiences or lack credible sources and scientific backing are excluded.

original_query.title: trend of ocean pollution
original_query.description: How is plastic pollution in the oceans has developed through the years and what is it expected to look like?
original_query.narrative: Relevant documents include information about how plastic in oceans has increased in the last years based on graphs and data reliably collected by reasearch institutes, together with some prognostic for the future. If data are collected only up to a certain year, are not up-to-date anyrmore or are not scientifically justified, then the document is considered irrelevant. Also irrelevant are sources containing information about how plastic can be avoided in everyday life or selling eco-friendly products.

original_query.title: balanced vegan diet
original_query.description: What are some key nutrients and recipes for a balanced vegan diet?
original_query.narrative: Relevant sources offer insights into essential nutrients to integrate into recipes for vegans, such as protein sources, iron, vitamin B12, and calcium, along with strategies for a balanced vegan lifestyle by dieticians or nutritionists. Irrelevant documents include materials that focus on unrelated dietary practices or lack practical information, for examples if they just expose some health advantages associated with a vegan diet without comprehensive practical guidance on adopting and sustaining a vegan lifestyle.

original_query.title: business informatics jobs asti
original_query.description: What job opportunities are available for Business Informatics graduates in Asti (Italy)?
original_query.narrative: Relevant documents provide information on the current job opportunities and career prospects for graduates with a degree in Business Informatics in the city of Asti in Italy, with details on the types of roles, industries, and companies hiring individuals with this qualification. Irrelevant documents does not provide substantial information about the jobs. Additionally, sources promoting job positions unrelated to the field of Business Informatics or not specific to the Asti region should be considered irrelevant.

query: decorate small spaces on a budget

original_query.title: decorate small spaces on a budget
original_query.description: What are some creative and budget-friendly interior decorating ideas for a house with small spaces?
original_query.narrative: Relevant documents should provide a variety of creative and budget-friendly house decorating ideas with pictures, tailored to small spaces, including tips on maximizing storage, optimizing furniture arrangement, and choosing color schemes to enhance the perception of space. Additionally, relevant materials should offer insights into DIY projects, repurposing techniques, and cost-effective decor solutions. Irrelevant documents encompass house decorating ideas unrelated to interior decoration, such as gardening, or unrelated to residential properties, like office spaces, as well as those lacking substantial information on budget-friendly solutions, only promoting high-cost or luxury decor options.
